name: Library (itch) (LemonCasino)
description:
This is my submission for Friday night game jam. In this jam we had to make a game in 3 hours and on the theme "The end of summer". This is a short 2D jigsaw puzzle game.

This is my interpretation of the theme: 

Summer has ended. Soon all the students would be coming back to school. You are the librarian at Melon High. It is your job to rearrange all the books on the shelf and to properly fit them in the box. Goodluck!

All the 2D assests and code was made by me under 3 hours.

Music credit : YouTube Studios.
